Alberta. Alberta Occupational Health and Safety.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Earlier ed. issued by Alberta Community and Occupational Health, Library Services Branch.

"The Audio Visual Service lends films and videos on aspects of workplace health and safety ... ... available for loan to any worker or workplace in Alberta. The Audio Visual Service is part of Library Services which provides information and publications on occupational health and safety issues to Albertans."--Foreword.
